Text: "Understanding Power" would be a good book to start out with.
There is no conspiracy behind 9/11, it's the same as what happened with the Reichstag's fire, it just happened to be a communist-dutch-Jew that had burned it - and they took advantage of it.
I own several of his books, and I have to say it started justifiable and eventually he lost all credibility with me.  He's a cloaking neo-con.
